room_title: Escape room "The Old Family Cabin" by Hidden Puzzle Rooms in Minneapolis - St. Paul
room_address: 1935 County Road B2 West Suite 75 Roseville, MN 55113
room_description: You are an investigator for Hidden Puzzles Detective Agency. Jane Kingsley needs your help. It has recently been discovered that her great-grandmother was a murderer and Jane needs to restore her family’s honor. She has spent weeks searching the family’s old cabin for proof of the murders in order to bring closure to the families. She’s away on a business trip and has just learned that the new owners are demolishing the cabin in one hour. If she’s ever going to get the proof she needs, she needs you to find it. Good luck, Detectives! You have 60 minutes.
